subject: College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: The Scarlet Knights open their season at home Friday, a game that will serve as the debut of freshman Corey Chandler, Rutgers’s first major recruit under coach Fred Hill.
snippet: The Scarlet Knights open their season at home Friday, a game that will serve as the debut of freshman Corey Chandler, Rutgers’s first major recruit under coach Fred Hill.
